name: CARED
description:
Metroid meets tamagotchi in dystopia/cyberpunk setting. In a town full of hostile androids, you have to keep alive a mysterious girl on a throne in the church and free her from this place by deactivating four nodes. Explore the town, fight enemies and take good care of the girl. 

Controls:

Arrows or WASD to move
Z or E - attack
X or T - switch weapon
Space to Jump and interact
